attributes.review: U had heard so many great things about this app so I decided to try it and to my surprise it was the worst app I have ever downloaded. I thought maybe with this app I would realize that I should vote for my president once more but I was wrong.😔 I don’t not recommend this app.
attributes.title: Don’t get this app

attributes.review: I downloaded the app then a few minutes later my gold fish was gone😡 This app is very horrible that it even made me throw up. It’s sad to say that people actually support the Cheeto puff. Wouldn’t recommend. Also, I want my gold fish back as possible! 😡 DONT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU WANT YOUR GOLDFISH TO GO MISSING.(It also caused my aunts death)
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: I almost died I downloaded bc this app. I was on my way to school. Then I saw trump and some helicopters then he saw me and said “fire”. I got my lunch box and started throwing my food at him, then I threw my orange and he said that was his mom. I ran back to my house  and my dog tried to protect me but then they killed him. Now I vote no on president trump.🍊
attributes.title: The orange

attributes.review: When I logged on it constantly glitched to an orange screen.... come to think of it that could have just been a picture of our president. I’m not entirely sure. Anyway though, the app is poorly made and poorly managed and honestly doesn’t have the best concepts.
attributes.title: Why?

attributes.review: I don’t know how this app works I just wanted to see what all this fuss is about but it kept glitching and I had perfectly good Wi-Fi and then I go to my other apps that need Wi-Fi and they work perfectly fine there’s something wrong with this app and it’s completely terrible!
attributes.title: Stole info

attributes.review: This made my phone crash down to the moment where I had to restart my phone and loose all my data. The app was so slow to the point where everything would load I would be sleeping it took so long. Horribly made app.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review:
Whether you like Donald trump or not DO NOT GET. The moment I got this app my phone was hacked, and the this app sent me a notification saying I am not allowed to get this app because my language on my phone is Spanish, even though I speak fluent English,
And I am a citizen, this app repeatedly hacked my phone.
attributes.title: Do not get

attributes.review: I rlly thought that this app would turn my skin into a Cheeto but it didn’t work and this app has so many glitches you can’t even tell what your seeing. This app is only for boomers , this is a 0/10 . It doesn’t work, it’s racist and it’s criticizing people. It is unbelievable 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭
attributes.title: Scammmed

attributes.review: I was using the app one day and noticed that they were stealing all of my data. The government then used that data to come to my house and drop kick everybody in my family. I still have the shoe print on my face. Don’t recommend, please get this app deleted.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: Gives you everything and all things Donald trump
attributes.title: Great app
